Desc.eng: Finally! I hope that it wasn’t too boring for the great hunter. I should begin the preparations. I’ll ask you again when I need something else.
Don’t do that. Flattery only makes her edgy.
You are so rude. I demand an apology!
How about a nice collection of rat bones? You sure look like someone who could use them... for something strange, mystical and uncanny.
Aren’t you adorable? And you are right. I’m going to perform a grand ritual for the Resistance, and these bones will be useful.
